title: Sci-Fi Movie | The Phantom from 10,000 Leagues (1955) by Dan Milner | Colorized

sources.title: Sci-Fi Movie | The Phantom from 10,000 Leagues (1955) by Dan Milner | Colorized
sources.description:
Freezing horror! Hideous atomic mutant strikes from the depths!
An unusual radioactive rock on the sea bottom mutates the ocean life into a horrible monster. When charred, radioactive bodies begin to drift ashore, a scientist and government agent investigate the phenomenon, and it's connection to a local marine biology professor.

Original title: The Phantom from 10,000 Leagues (1955)
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/gPJdkZkPb0s


Director: Dan Milner
Writers: Lou Rusoff, Dorys Lukather
Stars: Kent Taylor, Cathy Downs, Michael Whalen
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Horror, Sci-Fi, Colorized classics
Budget: $100,000


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
03:42 A beachcomber gets involved in a deadly scientific experiment.
12:07 A mysterious scientist suspects foul play related to radiation burns on boats and missing bodies near a coastal school.
24:43 Mysterious underwater radiation leads to deaths investigated by oceanographer and federal investigator.
32:21 A scientist suspects a dangerous weapon is being sold to the highest bidder, leading to concerns for a diver's safety.
36:56 Intrigue and betrayal unfold as individuals seek scientific secrets and navigate dangerous waters.
47:23 Investigation into attempted murder and dangerous radioactive light leads to uncovering a sinister plot.
59:07 A mysterious murder investigation unfolds, implicating a professor and his assistant in a deadly plot.
1:07:19 Mystery unfolds as the true culprit behind the murders is revealed, leading to a decision on the dangerous Hydro Energy Force.
1:12:28 A scientist's creation causes destruction, leading to a search for answers and a realization of the consequences.
